    AZ3166 WiFi

    The WiFiClass class is for Arduino Wifi shield.

    Assembly

    AZ3166WiFi.h

    Summary

    Types
    IPAddress
    Constructors
    WiFiClass - WiFiClass()
    Methods
    firmwareVersion - const char *firmwareVersion()
    begin - int begin(void)
    begin - int begin(char *ssid)
    begin - int begin(char *ssid, const char *passphrase)
    disconnect - int disconnect()
    beginAP - int beginAP(char *ssid, const char *passphrase)
    disconnectAP - int disconnectAP()
    macAddress - uint8_t *macAddress(uint8_t *mac)
    localIP - IPAddress localIP()
    subnetMask - IPAddress subnetMask()
    gatewayIP - IPAddress gatewayIP()
    SSID - const char *SSID()
    SSID - const char *SSID(uint8_t networkItem)
    BSSID - uint8_t *BSSID(uint8_t *bssid)
    RSSI - int32_t RSSI()
    RSSI - int32_t RSSI(uint8_t networkItem)
    encryptionType - uint8_t encryptionType()
    encryptionType - uint8_t encryptionType(uint8_t networkItem)
    scanNetworks - int8_t scanNetworks()
    status - uint8_t status()

    Types

    IPAddress

    Base class that provides IPAddress

    Source code: https://github.com/Microsoft/AzureIoTDeveloperKit/blob/master/AZ3166/AZ3166-1.0.0/cores/arduino/IPAddress.h

    Constructors

    WiFiClass

    WiFiClass()

    Parameters

    None.

    Methods

    firmwareVersion

    const char *firmwareVersion()

    Get WiFi firmware version.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    char * Firmware version string.

    begin

    int begin(void)

    Connect to Wifi.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int 3 (WL_CONNECTED) for success, 4 (WL_CONNECT_FAILED) for fail.

    begin

    int begin(char *ssid)

    Connect to Wifi with specific SSID.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    char * ssid The specific WiFi SSID.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int 3 (WL_CONNECTED) for success, 4 (WL_CONNECT_FAILED) for fail.

    begin

    int begin(char* ssid, const char *passphrase)

    Connect to Wifi with specific SSID and passphrase.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    char * ssid The specific WiFi SSID.
    char * passphrase The specific WiFi passphrase.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int 3 (WL_CONNECTED) for success, 4 (WL_CONNECT_FAILED) for fail.

    disconnect

    int disconnect()

    Disconnect from WiFi.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int Always 1 (WL_SUCCESS).

    beginAP

    int beginAP(char *ssid, const char *passphrase)

    Create an AP with specific SSID and passphrase.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    char * ssid The specific AP SSID.
    char * passphrase The specific AP passphrase.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int 3 (WL_CONNECTED) for success, 4 (WL_CONNECT_FAILED) for fail.

    disconnectAP

    int disconnectAP()

    Disconnect from AP.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int Always 1 (WL_SUCCESS).

    macAddress

    uint8_t *macAddress(uint8_t *mac)

    Get WiFi MAC Address

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    uint8_t * mac The pointer to WiFi MAC address.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t * The pointer to WiFi MAC address.

    localIP

    IPAddress localIP()

    Get WiFi interface local IP address.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    IPAddress WiFi interface local IP address.

    subnetMask

    IPAddress subnetMask()

    Get WiFi subnet mark.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    IPAddress WiFi interface subnet mark.

    gatewayIP

    IPAddress gatewayIP()

    Get network gateway IP address.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    IPAddress WiFi gateway IP address.

    SSID

    const char *SSID()

    Get current network SSID.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    const char * Pointer to current network SSID.

    SSID

    const char *SSID(uint8_t networkItem)

    Get specific network SSID.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    uint8_t networkItem Specific network index in the AP list.

    Return value

    Type Description
    const char * Pointer to current network SSID.

    BSSID

    uint8_t *BSSID(uint8_t *bssid)

    Get current connected WiFi BSSID.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    uint8_t * bssid Pointer to current network BSSID.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t * Pointer to current network BSSID.

    RSSI

    int32_t RSSI()

    Get current connected WiFi RSSI.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int32_t Current connected WiFi RSSI.

    RSSI

    int32_t RSSI(uint8_t networkItem)

    Get specific network RSSI.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    uint8_t networkItem Specific network index in the AP list.

    Return value

    Type Description
    int32_t Current connected WiFi RSSI.

    encryptionType

    uint8_t encryptionType()

    Get the encryption type of the current network.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t Always 4 (ENC_TYPE_CCMP).

    encryptionType

    uint8_t encryptionType(uint8_t networkItem)

    Get the encryption type of the specific network.

    Parameters

    Type Name Description
    uint8_t networkItem Specific network index in the AP list.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t Specific network encryption type. Possible values: 5 (ENC_TYPE_WEP), 2 (ENC_TYPE_TKIP), 4 (ENC_TYPE_CCMP), 8 (ENC_TYPE_AUTO) and 7 (ENC_TYPE_NONE).

    scanNetworks

    int8_t scanNetworks()

    Scan networks.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t Total number of found networks.

    status

    uint8_t status()

    Get current network status.

    Parameters

    None.

    Return value

    Type Description
    uint8_t Current network status.

    https://github.com/Microsoft/AzureIoTDeveloperKit/blob/master/AZ3166/AZ3166-1.0.0/libraries/WiFi/src/AZ3166WiFi.h
